shnitsel.rd¶

This module contains functions that accept an RDKit.Chem.Mol object; but not necessarily functions that return a Mol object.

Functions¶

set_atom_props(mol, **kws)

mol_to_numbered_smiles(mol)

highlight_pairs(mol, pairs)
